code: import React,{useContext}from"react";import axios from"axios";import{Controlled as CodeMirror}from"react-codemirror2";import"codemirror/lib/codemirror.css";import"codemirror/theme/material.css";import"codemirror/mode/clike/clike";import"codemirror/mode/python/python";import{CodeContext}from"../../codeContext.jsx";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const CodeEditor=()=>{const{code,setCode,language,setLanguage,setResult,setShowTracker,input1,input2}=useContext(CodeContext);const RunCode=()=>{axios.post('http://localhost:8000/python/editor1',{code:code,input1:input1,input2:input2}).then(_ref=>{let{data}=_ref;setResult(data);setShowTracker(true);console.log(data);}).catch(()=>alert("Error in connectivity with backend !!"));};const handleCodeChange=value=>{if(value==="python"){setCode("#code Here");}else{setCode("//code Here");}};const handleLanguageChange=event=>{const selectedLanguage=event.target.value;setLanguage(selectedLanguage);handleCodeChange(selectedLanguage);};const getMode=language=>{switch(language){case"python":return"python";case"c":case"cpp":return"text/x-csrc";case"java":return"text/x-java";default:return"python";}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{style:{backgroundColor:"rgb(12, 16, 33)"},id:"CodeEditor-div",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{id:"Languages-Title",children:"Languages"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("select",{id:"Languages",name:"languages",onChange:handleLanguageChange,value:language,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("option",{value:"python",children:"Python"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("option",{value:"c",children:"C"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("option",{value:"cpp",children:"Cpp"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("option",{value:"java",children:"Java"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{id:"Run",onClick:RunCode,children:"Run"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(CodeMirror,{value:code,options:{mode:getMode(language),theme:"material",lineNumbers:true},onBeforeChange:(_editor,_data,value)=>{setCode(value);},className:"code-mirror"})]});};export default CodeEditor;
